verses.verse: Moreover, the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> me up and brought <S%H935><s%> me to the east <S%H6931><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the Lord's house <S%H1004><s%> which faced <S%H6437><s%> eastward. <S%H6931><s%> And behold, <S%H2009><s%> [there were] twenty-five men <S%H376><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and among <S%H8432><s%> them I saw <S%H7200><s%> Jaazaniah <S%H2970><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Azzur <S%H5809><s%> and Pelatiah <S%H6410><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> leaders <S%H8269><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the men <S%H376><s%> who devise <S%H2803><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> and give <S%H3289><s%> evil <S%H9563><s%> advice <S%H6098><s%> in this <S%H384><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%>
who say, <S%H559><s%> 'Is not [the time] near <S%H7138><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>? This <S%H1931><s%> [city] is the pot <S%H5518><s%> and we are the flesh. <S%H1320><s%>'
"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy! <S%H5012><s%>"

Then the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon me, and He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "So <S%H3651><s%> you think, <S%H559><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for I know <S%H3045><s%> your thoughts. <S%H9280><s%> <S%H7307><s%>
"You have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your slain <S%H2491><s%> in this <S%H384><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> filling <S%H4390><s%> its streets <S%H2351><s%> with them."

'Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Your slain <S%H2491><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have laid <S%H7760><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city are the flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and this <S%H1931><s%> [city] is the pot; <S%H5518><s%> but I shall bring <S%H3318><s%> you out of it.
"You have feared <S%H3372><s%> a sword; <S%H2719><s%> so I will bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon you," the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> declares. <S%H5002><s%>

"And I shall bring <S%H3318><s%> you out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city, and I shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> you into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%> and execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> against you.

"You will fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%> I shall judge <S%H8199><s%> you to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> so you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"This <S%H1931><s%> [city] will not be a pot <S%H5518><s%> for you, nor <S%H3808><s%> will you be flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it, [but] I shall judge <S%H8199><s%> you to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Thus you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> for you have not walked <S%H1980><s%> in My statutes <S%H2706><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> have you executed <S%H6213><s%> My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> but have acted <S%H6213><s%> according to the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> you."' "

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about as I prophesied, <S%H5012><s%> that Pelatiah <S%H6410><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%> Then I fell <S%H5307><s%> on my face <S%H6440><s%> and cried <S%H2199><s%> out with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Alas, <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> God! <S%H3068><s%> Wilt Thou bring <S%H6213><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to a complete <S%H3617><s%> end <S%H3617><s%>?"
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> your brothers, <S%H251><s%> your relatives, <S%H251><s%> your fellow <S%H376><s%> exiles, <S%H1546><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them, [are those] to whom <S%H834><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> have said, <S%H559><s%> 'Go <S%H7368><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> land <S%H776><s%> has been given <S%H5414><s%> us as a possession. <S%H4181><s%>'

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Though <S%H3588><s%> I had removed <S%H7368><s%> them far <S%H7368><s%> away among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and though <S%H3588><s%> I had scattered <S%H6327><s%> them among the countries, <S%H776><s%> yet I was a sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> for them a little <S%H4592><s%> while <S%H4592><s%> in the countries <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had gone. <S%H935><s%> "'

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I shall gather <S%H6908><s%> you from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> and assemble <S%H622><s%> you out of the countries <S%H776><s%> among which <S%H834><s%> you have been scattered, <S%H6327><s%> and I shall give <S%H5414><s%> you the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> "'

"When they come <S%H935><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> they will remove <S%H5493><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> its detestable <S%H8251><s%> things <S%H8251><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its abominations <S%H8441><s%> from it.

"And I shall give <S%H5414><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> them. And I shall take <S%H5493><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> out of their flesh <S%H1320><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> them a heart <S%H3820><s%> of flesh, <S%H1320><s%>

that they may walk <S%H1980><s%> in My statutes <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them. Then they will be My people, <S%H5971><s%> and I shall be their God. <S%H430><s%>

"But as for those whose hearts <S%H3820><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> after their detestable <S%H8251><s%> things <S%H8251><s%> and abominations, <S%H8441><s%> I shall bring <S%H5414><s%> their conduct <S%H1870><s%> down <S%H5414><s%> on their heads, <S%H7218><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

Then the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> up their wings <S%H3671><s%> with the wheels <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them, and the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> hovered <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them.

And the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is east <S%H6924><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> me up and brought <S%H935><s%> me in a vision <S%H4758><s%> by the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to the exiles <S%H1473><s%> in Chaldea. <S%H3778><s%> So the vision <S%H4758><s%> that I had seen <S%H7200><s%> left <S%H5927><s%> me.
Then I told <S%H1696><s%> the exiles <S%H1473><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the things <S%H1697><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had shown <S%H7200><s%> me.
